HomePage.title: The <gradient>Full-Stack</gradient> Developer.
HomePage.paragraph: I make accessible, high-performance websites with strong SEO and clean code. My portfolio is in the development process; in the meantime, feel free to contact me via email, GitHub, and LinkedIn.

Metadata.title: Full-Stack Developer | Furkan Eryılmaz
Metadata.description: Portfolio of Furkan Eryılmaz, a full-stack software developer specializing in high-performance web development, clean code, SEO, and user-centric design.
